Framework
Class DisplayObject

java.lang.Object
  Framework.DisplayObject

public class DisplayObject
extends java.lang.Object

The DisplayObject contains all the data for displaying something by a Core instance.

Version:
(24.07.2018)
Author:
(Marc Price)
